feed.title: Welcome to my webpage (currently being built)!
feed.subtitle: AOS student

entry.title: Introduction
entry.content:
Hello! I’m a PhD student with a strong interest in studying how to better describe and model the earth system. My focus is on ocean physics and ocean/climate modeling, though I have a strong drive to develop and expand my knowledge in all adjacent subjects such as atmospheric physics, air-sea interactions, general applied mathematics, and much more.

In my free time I enjoy reading literature, admiring and exploring our beautiful natural world, and spending with my dog, Cauchy, and cat, Ashley.

Thanks for visiting my page!
entry.summary: Hello! I’m a PhD student with a strong interest in studying how to better describe and model the earth system. My focus is on ocean physics and ocean/climate modeling, though I have a strong drive to develop and expand my knowledge in all adjacent subjects such as atmospheric physics, air-sea interactions, general applied mathematics, and much more.
